question: What level of risk do you think people have of harming themselves physically or in other ways when they use tobacco once or twice a week?
What level of risk do you think people have of harming themselves physically or in other ways when they binge drink alcoholic beverages once or twice a week?
What level of risk do you think people have of harming themselves physically or in other ways when they use marijuana or hashish once or twice a week?
What level of risk do you think people have of harming themselves physically if they share needles, syringes, or other injection equipment when using drugs?
What level of risk do you think people have of harming themselves physically or in other ways when they use non-prescription opioid drugs once or twice a week?
What level of risk do you think people have of harming themselves physically, or in other ways, when they take prescription opioid drugs without a doctor's order once or twice a week?
What level of risk do you think people have of harming themselves if they have sex (oral, vaginal, or anal) without a condom or dental damn?
What level of risk do you think people have of harming themselves if they have sex while high on drugs or under the influence of alcohol?
